display_name: [Dawn of an Ideal World] Fusion Zamasu

kit.leader_skill: "Worldwide Chaos" or "Potara" Category Ki +4 and HP, ATK & DEF +170%

super_attack.name: Blades of Judgement (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK and; massively raises DEF for 1 turn; Causes colossal damage to enemy; Lowers ATK

ultra_super_attack.name: Holy Wrath (Extreme)
ultra_super_attack.effect: Massively raises ATK and; greatly raises DEF for 1 turn; Causes mega-colossal damage to enemy; Greatly lowers ATK

passive_skill.name: Zamasu Is the Power of the Universe
passive_skill.effect: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is another "Potara" Category ally on the team upon the character's entry: (Once) Receives an additional Ki +1 per Ki Sphere obtained and changes TEQ Ki Spheres to Rainbow Ki Spheres for 5 turns; (Once) Receives an additional Ki +1 per Ki Sphere obtained; (Once) Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (INT & TEQ excluded) to INT Ki Spheres; (Once) ATK & DEF 200% up; (Once) Damage reduction rate 30% up; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 50% up; Launches an additional Super Attack; When attacking with 18 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 50% up; Attacks are effective against all Types; Launches an additional Super Attack; When attacking with 24 Ki: ATK & DEF 100% up; Performs a critical hit; For every attack received or evaded: Damage reduction rate 10% up within the turn (up to 30%); (Forever) Ki +1 (up to +5); Every time the character receives 3 or more attacks in battle, or every time the character evades 3 or more attacks in battle: Recovers 10% HP at the end of turn (up to once within a turn); When receiving an Unarmed Super Attack: Great chance of nullifying it and countering with tremendous power; Nullifies it and counters with tremendous power with 10 or more Ki Spheres obtained

lines.text: Receives an additional Ki +1 per Ki Sphere obtained and changes TEQ Ki Spheres to Rainbow Ki Spheres for 5 turns
lines.context: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is another "Potara" Category ally on the team upon the character's entry

lines.text: Receives an additional Ki +1 per Ki Sphere obtained
lines.context: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is another "Potara" Category ally on the team upon the character's entry

lines.text: Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (INT & TEQ excluded) to INT Ki Spheres
lines.context: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is another "Potara" Category ally on the team upon the character's entry

lines.text: ATK & DEF 200% up
lines.context: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is another "Potara" Category ally on the team upon the character's entry

lines.text: Damage reduction rate 30% up
lines.context: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is another "Potara" Category ally on the team upon the character's entry

lines.text: ATK & DEF 50% up
lines.context: When attacking with 12 or more Ki

lines.text: Launches an additional Super Attack
lines.context: When attacking with 12 or more Ki

lines.text: ATK & DEF 50% up
lines.context: When attacking with 18 or more Ki

lines.text: Attacks are effective against all Types
lines.context: When attacking with 18 or more Ki

lines.text: Launches an additional Super Attack
lines.context: When attacking with 18 or more Ki

lines.text: ATK & DEF 100% up
lines.context: When attacking with 24 Ki

lines.text: Performs a critical hit
lines.context: When attacking with 24 Ki

lines.text: Damage reduction rate 10% up within the turn (up to 30%)
lines.context: For every attack received or evaded

lines.text: Ki +1 (up to +5)
lines.context: For every attack received or evaded

lines.text: Recovers 10% HP at the end of turn (up to once within a turn)
lines.context: Every time the character receives 3 or more attacks in battle, or every time the character evades 3 or more attacks in battle

lines.text: Great chance of nullifying it and countering with tremendous power
lines.context: When receiving an Unarmed Super Attack

lines.text: Nullifies it and counters with tremendous power with 10 or more Ki Spheres obtained
lines.context: When receiving an Unarmed Super Attack

active_skill.name: Lightning of Absolution
active_skill.effect: Massively raises ATK temporarily,; causes ultimate damage; Stuns the enemy for 1 turn
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated after performing 5 or more s in battle (once only)
